import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns
from sklearn.cluster import KMeans
from sklearn.preprocessing import MinMaxScaler
%matplotlib inline
sns.set()

import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings("ignore", category=FutureWarning)
#warnings.filterwarnings("ignore", category=DeprecationWarning)
#warnings.filterwarnings("ignore")

from subprocess import check_output
print(check_output(["ls", "../input"]).decode("utf8"))

#Linechart
plt.plot(titanic['Survived'], titanic['Fare'], color='black', marker='o')
plt.title('Survived Vs Fare', fontsize=14) # untuk menampilkan judul
plt.xlabel('Survived', fontsize=14) # untuk mencetak label di sumbu x
plt.ylabel('Fare', fontsize=14) # untuk mencetak label di sumbu Y
plt.grid()
plt.show() # untuk menampilkan visualisasi

source.b662cb92:
#Menghilangkan Kolom Yang Tidak Perlu ---
titanic= titanic.drop(["PassengerId", "Name", "SibSp", "Parch", "Ticket", "Cabin", "Pclass", "Sex", "Age", "Embarked"], axis = 1)
titanic.head()
source.075045ba:
#Menentukan variabel yang akan di klusterkan ---
titanic_x = titanic.iloc[:, 0:3]
titanic_x.head()
source.b350e7eb:
#Memvisualkan persebaran data ---
plt.scatter(titanic.Survived, titanic.Fare, s =10, c = "c", marker = "o", alpha = 1)
plt.show()
source.4c5cf956:
#Mengubah Variabel Data Frame Menjadi Array
x_array =  np.array(titanic_x)
print(x_array)
source.d3969458:
#Menstandarkan Ukuran Variabel ---
scaler = MinMaxScaler()
x_scaled = scaler.fit_transform(x_array)
x_scaled
source.34c91f8b:
#Menentukan dan mengkonfigurasi fungsi kmeans ---
kmeans = KMeans(n_clusters = 3, random_state=123)
#Menentukan kluster dari data ---
kmeans.fit(x_scaled)
source.f44bbb97:
#Menampilkan Hasil Kluster ---
print(kmeans.labels_)
#Menambahkan Kolom "kluster" Dalam Data Frame Driver ---
titanic["kluster"] = kmeans.labels_
source.2573c616:
#Memvisualkan hasil kluster ---
output = plt.scatter(x_scaled[:,0], x_scaled[:,1], s = 20, c = titanic.kluster, marker = "o", alpha = 1, )
centers = kmeans.cluster_centers_
plt.scatter(centers[:,0], centers[:,1], c='red', s=30, alpha=1 , marker="s");
plt.title("Klustering K-Means Fare vs Survived")
plt.colorbar (output)
plt.show()
